Package com.intellij.ui.jcef

Class JBCefApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.jcef.JBCefApp

  • public abstract class JBCefApp
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper over CefApp.

    Use getInstance() to get the app (triggers CEF startup on first call). Use createClient() to create a client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JBCefApp.CefAppConfig 
      static interface  JBCefApp.JBCefSchemeHandlerFactory

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static JBCefApp getInstance()
        Returns JBCefApp instance. If the app has not yet been initialized then starts up CEF and initializes the app.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when JCEF initialization is not possible in current env

      • isEnabled

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isEnabled()
        Deprecated. should not be used after JCEF is enabled by default
        Should be used to check if JCEF is enabled in the platform, until it is enabled by default.

      • getCefAppConfig

        protected abstract JBCefApp.CefAppConfig getCefAppConfig()

      • createClient

        public JBCefClient createClient()

      • addCefSchemeHandlerFactory

        public static void addCefSchemeHandlerFactory(JBCefApp.JBCefSchemeHandlerFactory factory)
        Adds a scheme handler factory. The method should be called prior to JBCefApp initialization (performed by getInstance()). For instance, via the IDE application service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the method is called after JBCefApp initialization
